name: Santa's Christmas Rampage
description:
Help Santa protecting his bag of gifts from hordes of curious little kids.

Teach those kids a lesson with a bunch of snowballs or a nice punch in the face!

Keys:

  • Left and Right: Move
  • Space Bar: Throw Snowball/Punch
  • Ctrl: "Christmas Time"

Instructions:

In this game the player controls Santa Claus, throwing snowballs at children, without letting them take your bag home.
Sometimes, the kids grab Santa so that he can't move.
He must give them some punches so that they let him go.
Depending on the player's performance, he gets a different ranking.

Introduction:

On Christmas Eve, while Santa was driving his sleigh delivering gifts, he had a problem and had to do an emergency landing.
The sound of the crash made every kid in the neighborhood to get out of their houses and, seeing Santa's bag, decided to keep all the presents to themselves.
The only way to make sure good-behaved children have their gifts is to protect the bag, no matter what it takes!
